SELECT bwton_user_prop_relation.prop_id, prop_name, prop_count FROM bwton_prop_dict, bwton_user_prop_relation WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND bwton_user_prop_relation.prop_id = bwton_prop_dict.prop_id AND bwton_prop_dict.prop_id = #{propId}
